meanings.definition: A line or border that marks the edge of an area.
meanings.sent1: The grens between the two fields was clearly visible.
meanings.sent2: Please do not cross the grens into the restricted area.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel danced along the grens, teasing the dog.
meanings.sent4: The grens of reality and fantasy blurred in her dreams.
meanings.sent5: The grens of the garden were outlined by colorful flowers and shrubs.

meanings.definition: To mark or set a boundary.
meanings.sent1: She used a stick to grens off the area for the picnic.
meanings.sent2: Please grens the path clearly so others know where to walk.
meanings.sent3: The children decided to grens their play area with colorful chalk.
meanings.sent4: His determination to succeed helped him grens his goals effectively.
meanings.sent5: The artist carefully grens the canvas before starting to paint.

meanings.definition: The act of reaching a limit or boundary.
meanings.sent1: The grens of her patience were tested by the constant noise.
meanings.sent2: He felt a sense of accomplishment upon reaching the grens of his endurance.
meanings.sent3: The grens of the game were pushed further with each new level.
meanings.sent4: She pushed herself to the grens of her physical abilities during the race.
meanings.sent5: The grens of the sky seemed to stretch endlessly above them.
